attributes.action: simply carry on doing what is right.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not what is politically expedient. Ignore the hypocrisy that is pouring out of the press and the easily deceived. Ignore the spin doctors and the pollsters. Ignore the greedy and the self-serving. You are the only Prime Minister in recent times to stand up for me and those like me who only want what is right and fair and reasonable. Be brave, Be bold. Stand your ground. Do what is right.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
